title: Manufacturer's Sample Book, 1939
medium:
Medium: silk, rayon, linen, paper
Technique: printed
description: Sample book in blue paper binding with a yellow label: Maxine Fabrics Co. Inc. Finsilver – Koslin Silks, Novelties, Prints. Spring and Summer 1939. Contains 162 samples pasted to paper pages; 91 printed silks, 17 novelty silks, 45 synthetics, 9 rayon and linen.

tombstone.epitaph:
Manufacturer's Sample Book, 1939.
1939. Medium: silk, rayon, linen, paper
Technique: printed. Gift of William Hardy, Inc.. 1939-61-1.
